Pre-Game Insights: Miami heads to Golden State for a non-conference matchup.
The Warriors have gone 10-9 in home games.
The Heat are 7-10 on the road.
The Warriors average 15.2 made 3-pointers per game this season, 1.6 more made shots on average than the 13.6 per game the Heat give up.
The Heat average 14.0 made 3-pointers per game this season, 0.7 more makes per game than the Warriors allow.
Stephen Curry is averaging 22.5 points and 6.3 assists for the Warriors.
Bam Adebayo is averaging 16.1 points, 9.8 rebounds and 4.7 assists for the Heat.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Golden State ranks fourth in the league with 12.7 offensive rebounds per game led by Kevon Looney averaging 3.0 offensive boards.
The Heat have a 2-6 record in one-possession games.
Brandin Podziemski: day to day (abdominal), Gary Payton II: out (calf), Jonathan Kuminga: out (ankle).
Dru Smith: out for season (achilles), Josh Richardson: out (heel).
